overview: The unique vision of one of adult's leading photographers Laurent Sky now comes to the big screen in the searingly original 'Raw Desire.' Amazing music, incredible sets and the strangest sex allowed by law combine to create an eroticism never before seen. With luscious Teagan turning your world inside out in a laser-driven scene that is positively an other-wordly experience. Advance screenings already have critics calling Raw Desire 'the most explosive film of the year.' Prepare for an experience you won't soon forget.
title: Raw Desire
